page.title: 08HEDGEROW ECOLOGY WEST FLEGG
page.content: We went to a hedge down Back Lane, Rollesby.It is about 500 years old. We knew it was old because of all the different species of plants and herbs that grew there,and that actually made the hedge. A farmer had pulled the original hedge up,but part of it grew again. Here are a list of the plants and herbs that we saw: Cow Parsley Hog Weed Nettles Dock Leaves Rosebay Willow Herb Campions Blackberries Buttercups Oak Tree Herb Robert Brambles Sedge Speedwell Dog Rose Primroses Elm Goose Grass Field Maple The hedge is Three Tenths of a mile long.
